{% comment documentation::parameters %} @page_obj:: object list values @ajax_pagination:: boolean @callback:: JS function to get next values of page. Use like that: callback='functionName' {% endcomment %} {% if ajax_pagination is True %}
  • «
  • ‹
    • {% if page_obj.paginator.num_pages > 1 %} {% for num in page_obj.paginator.page_range %} {% if page_obj.number == num %}
  • {{ num }}
    • {% elif num > page_obj.number|add:'-3' and num < page_obj.number|add:'3' %}
  • {{ num }}
    • {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% else %}
  • 1
    • {% endif %}
  • ›
  • »
{% else %} {% comment documentation::parameters %} @page_obj:: object list values {% endcomment %}
